actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a credit for amounts paid for prosthetic devices.

summary.text: Allows a tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for the amount paid by an individual during the taxable year for any prosthetic device for the taxpayer, his spouse, or any dependent. Limits such credit to the income tax imposed reduced by the sum of specified credits otherwise allowed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a credit for amounts paid for prosthetic devices.
